participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and resilient, Emily is passionate about her art and values her relationships. She's optimistic despite her past challenges and is always eager to learn something new.
participant_1.background: I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here. I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer. I am an artist from a small town in the midwest. my favorite car is the ford mustang. i have been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is warm-hearted and driven by his passions. He finds joy in connecting with others through music and cooking, and he is dedicated to making a positive impact on the world.
participant_2.background: I would brag about my love of reading and how I never miss a chance to curl up with a good book. my dream is to own my own restaurant. I have come to terms with my past and am now focused on helping others. I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people. I love the feeling of a job well done, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people.

content.text: Good! What do you do for work?
I'm an artist from a small town in the Midwest. What about you?
I'm a musician and I love to cook!
Oh that's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun. What's your dream job?
I've always wanted to own my own restaurant.
That's a great goal! I love cooking too.
Me too! I love the feeling of a job well done, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people.
That's awesome! I love to hear that you're passionate about your work.
I'm glad! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read. I never miss a chance to curl up with a good book.
That's awesome! I love reading too. What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think my favorite is To Kill a Mockingbird.
Oh that's a great book! I love Harper Lee's writing
